nl.vpro.util

Class ReflectionUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • nl.vpro.util.ReflectionUtils

  • public class ReflectionUtils
extends Object
    This provides some basic reflection code to call setters and getters on java beans. There are of course other libraries available for these kind of things, but it it not hard, and this allows for customizing details of it. Most importantly we add a number of configured(Object, Map) methods so this class together with ConfigUtils provides a complete configuration mechanism.
    Since:
    0.40
    Author:
    Michiel Meeuwissen

      • configured

        public static <T> T configured(Class<T> clazz,
                               Map<String,String> properties)
        We can also create the instance itself (supporting the Builder pattern of lombok)
        Type Parameters:
        T - type of object to create
        Parameters:
        clazz - Class which can have a static 'builder' method, or a no args constructor
        properties - Properties which are used to configure the created instant
        Returns:
        a new, configured instance of T
